articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: 'Surrender or die,' militia leader tells Ukrainian fighters in Severodonetsk; Pope says war perhaps 'provoked' - CNBC
articles.description: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has said his country is dealing with "absolute evil" and must "knock out the occupiers from all our areas."
articles.content:
Pope Francis has again criticized Russia's invasion of Ukraine but also said that the war was "perhaps in some way provoked."
In the text of a conversation he had last month with the editors of Jesuâ€¦ [+832 chars]
